channel.title: Óscar Lamas Ríos
channel.description: Recent content on Óscar Lamas Ríos

item.title: Statistics obtention and visualization system based on padel videos
item.description: The incorporation of new technologies in recent years in the field of sports has promoted the extraction of large amounts of information, data and statistics of value for its subsequent analysis. In this regard, artificial intelligence plays a very important role, allowing to process of such data and create tools to support coaches in their strategy, improve player practice and performance, generate personalized advertising, or analyze the weaknesses of a rival, among many other applications.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to my personal blog! With this first post, I want to introduce you to what will be the content of this section. The content of the posts will provide us with information about different types of projects. Always publishing the reference links.
